value.verse: Beloved, let us love one another, *
Whoever does not love does not know God, *
In this the love of God was revealed among us, *
value.halfverse:
that God sent his only Son into the world,
so that we might live through Jesus Christ.

value.verse: In this is love, not that we loved God but that God loved us *
value.halfverse: and sent his Son that sins might be forgiven.

value.verse: Beloved, since God loved us so much, *
value.halfverse: we ought also to love one another.

value.verse: For if we love one another, God abides in us, *
value.halfverse: and God’s love will be perfected in us.
